remarks: Lemma for ~ dchrmusum and ~ dchrisumn0 .  Apply ~ dchrisum for the function ` 1 / y ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2016.)
statement:
rpvmasum.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
rpvmasum.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
rpvmasum.1 $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dchrisum.b $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrisum.n1 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .1. ) $.
dchrisumn0.f $e |- F = ( a e. NN |-> ( ( X ` ( L ` a ) ) / a ) ) $.
dchrmusumlema $p |- ( ph -> E. t E. c e. ( 0 [,) +oo ) ( seq 1 ( + , F ) ~~> t /\ A. y e. ( 1 [,) +oo ) ( abs ` ( ( seq 1 ( + , F ) ` ( |_ ` y ) ) - t ) ) <_ ( c / y ) ) ) $.
$d .1. c t y $.
$d D c t y $.
$d F c t y $.
$d L a c t y $.
$d N c t y $.
$d X a c t y $.
$d Z y $.
$d c ph t $.
